::Shadow Wing::

She smiled at him and nodded. "Ok", she said with a chuckle, "I'll 
let that do." She kissed Luinarpine on the cheek and laughed. "You 
sly wolf you." She smiled and walked to entrance.  She wanted to make 
sure nothing else was going to explode.

fealt

came
